title: Hardwood-style Flooring throughout, Leash Free Dog Park
map_address: 8299 Small Block Rd. near Raceway Dr
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 674 Sq.
Creekside at Northlake values your safety!
The community has implemented social distancing practices due to COVID-19.
Meet us virtually or by appointment for a socially distanced outside meeting!
9 Ft Ceilings, Stainless Steel upgraded appliance packages, Hardwood-style Flooring throughout, Washer and Dryer Connections, Quartz countertops, Walk-in Closets

24-Hour Fitness Studio, Stocked Fishing Pond, Pool Lounge Area, Play Park, Cyber Cafe, 24- Hour Clothes Care Center, Online Maintenance Requests, Leash Free Dog Park, Convenient Online Payments, Outdoor Kitchens/Grills, Walking Trail, Sparkling Swimming Pool
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 (non-refundable) pet deposit per pet and $150 (non-refundable) pet fee per pet.
Monthly pet rent is $20 per pet per month.
Please call our Leasing Center for additional information.
